description: Retrieves a list of the public and private hosted zones that are associated with the current Amazon Web Services account. The response includes a HostedZones child element for each hosted zone. Amazon Route 53 returns a maximum of 100 items in each response. If you have a lot of hosted zones, you can use the maxitems parameter to list them in groups of up to 100.

parameters.name: Marker
parameters.description: If the value of IsTruncated in the previous response was true, you have more hosted zones. To get more hosted zones, submit another ListHostedZones request. For the value of marker, specify the value of NextMarker from the previous response, which is the ID of the first hosted zone that Amazon Route 53 will return if you submit another request. If the value of IsTruncated in the previous response was false, there are no more hosted zones to get.

nested_items.name: HostedZones
nested_items.description: A complex type that contains general information about the hosted zone.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID that Amazon Route 53 assigned to the hosted zone when you created it.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the domain. For public hosted zones, this is the name that you have registered with your DNS registrar.

nested_items.name: CallerReference
nested_items.description: The value that you specified for CallerReference when you created the hosted zone.

nested_items.name: Comment
nested_items.description: Any comments that you want to include about the hosted zone.

nested_items.name: PrivateZone
nested_items.description: A value that indicates whether this is a private hosted zone.

nested_items.name: ResourceRecordSetCount
nested_items.description: The number of resource record sets in the hosted zone.

nested_items.name: LinkedService
nested_items.description: If the hosted zone was created by another service, the service that created the hosted zone. When a hosted zone is created by another service, you can't edit or delete it using Route 53.

nested_items.name: ServicePrincipal
nested_items.description: If the health check or hosted zone was created by another service, the service that created the resource. When a resource is created by another service, you can't edit or delete it using Amazon Route 53.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: If the health check or hosted zone was created by another service, an optional description that can be provided by the other service. When a resource is created by another service, you can't edit or delete it using Amazon Route 53.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: For the second and subsequent calls to ListHostedZones, Marker is the value that you specified for the marker parameter in the request that produced the current response.

nested_items.name: IsTruncated
nested_items.description: A flag indicating whether there are more hosted zones to be listed. If the response was truncated, you can get more hosted zones by submitting another ListHostedZones request and specifying the value of NextMarker in the marker parameter.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: If IsTruncated is true, the value of NextMarker identifies the first hosted zone in the next group of hosted zones. Submit another ListHostedZones request, and specify the value of NextMarker from the response in the marker parameter.

nested_items.name: MaxItems
nested_items.description: The value that you specified for the maxitems parameter in the call to ListHostedZones that produced the current response.
